credit_opinion.summary: SOFIMA/IMA is a performing credit with low distress score (8) and all bonds trading at or above par (100-101). Recent EUR 450m add-on at E+375bps and 100.5 demonstrates strong market access. IMA is a global leader in packaging automation machinery serving pharma, food, and consumer goods - defensive end markets with structural growth. Family ownership through Vacchi provides long-term stability and alignment. Well-termed maturity profile with bulk in 2028-2029. Limited financial transparency as private company but bond pricing suggests solid credit quality.
